Data: Shaheen Shah Afridi to Maxwell, 1 run Horrid fielding from Pakistan. Afridi is the culprit off his own bowling. Full on middle, played back, the bowler lazily lets it sneak through his hands
Shaheen Shah Afridi to Short, 1 run full and just a shade outside off, looks like a cutter that grips in the pitch and foils the timing, Short drags a heave but it does not carry to wide long-on
Shaheen Shah Afridi to Maxwell, 2 runs full-toss angling across off, Maxi carves it away to the right of deep third man. 100 up for Australia
Shaheen Shah Afridi to Maxwell, 1 run full and nipping into the pads, inside-edged away to square leg as Maxwell does not get enough bat onto the leg-side flick
Shaheen Shah Afridi to Short, no run inswinging yorker, nearly storms through the defences of Short and takes the leg stump. Lucky to get away is Short
Shaheen Shah Afridi to Short, 1 run Short rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and steers a single down to deep third man
Shadab to Short, no run flatter wrong'un, spins away past the waft outside off
Shadab to Short, FOUR runs back of a length and outside off, another googly, Short has a crack at it and slashes an outside edge fine of short third man

Shadab to Short, no run Short dabs this from outside off to short third man. There's a mix-up between the wickets. Maxi asks his partner to undo his steps. Short slips but dishes out a full-length dive to make his crease
Shadab to Short, 2 runs full and outside off, driven on the up to cover, where the fielder lets it through his legs. Short celebrates his return with a fifty and gets a hug from Maxi
Shadab to Short, 1 run opens the face and nurdles a single in front of point for one

Shadab to Maxwell, OUT Maxwell swings one straight into the lap of Ali at long-on. Pushed through on middle stump, Maxwell winds up and golf-swings it straight to the man in the deep. Two wickets in three overs for Pakistan
Hasan Ali to Short, no run Hasan hits a hard length on middle and forces the batsman to jab it back to him

Hasan Ali to Short, 1 run Dropped by Shadab at backward point. He throws himself to his right but the ball bursts out. Back of a length and outside leg following the moving batsman who chips a leading edge and continues to lead a charmed life
Hasan Ali to Stoinis, no run back of a length on middle stump, defended to the leg side off the back foot
Hasan Ali to Stoinis, no run pitched up and outside off, forward and drilled through the line to mid-off
Hasan Ali to Stoinis, 2 runs lifter, slower ball, outside off, periscoped away to third man
Hasan Ali to Stoinis, no run short inducker, nips back in and cramps the batsman for room. Stoinis inside-edges the ball beside his feet
Shadab to Short, no run Short skips out, Shadab darts a googly outside off, stabbed into the covers
Shadab to Short, no run another googly, turns and bounces outside off past the cut. Sarfraz lets the ball bounce out of his gloves now
Shadab to Short, 1 run full googly outside off, slapped to mid-off
Shadab to Stoinis, 1 run back of a length and breaks away outside off, lashed off the back foot to sweeper cover's right
Shadab to Short, FOUR runs Short camps back to this short googly and flashes another four fine of short third man for four
Shadab to Short, 1 run Short leans back to this skidder outside off and chops a risky single to short third man
Shaheen Shah Afridi to Head, 1 run full-toss wide outside off, sliced away to sweeper cover

Shaheen Shah Afridi to Short, OUT on a length and outside off, Short flays it straight to cover. He stays leg-side of this ball and holes out to Farhan. No celebration from Afridi. Short lost his shape while meeting the ball
Shaheen Shah Afridi to Carey, 1 run full and straight, Carey whips to deep square leg
Shaheen Shah Afridi to Head, FOUR runs really full and outside off, opens the face and squeezes it away between backward point and third man for four
Shaheen Shah Afridi to Head, FOUR runs overpitched and outside off, leans into a drive and places it to the right of mid-off for back-to-back fours
Shaheen Shah Afridi to Head, no run short and thuds in towards off stump, Head looks to pull but falls on the floor
Faheem to Carey, 1 run Carey jumps across off for a lap-sweep but this ball it too short for the shot. Edges it away behind square
Faheem to Head, SIX runs really full on middle, right in the slot, Head clears his front leg and walllllllllops it into the stands beyond midwicket. Brute power from Head
Faheem to Head, 1 wide off-side wide. Re-set the radar, Ashraf
Faheem to Head, 1 run very full on middle, Head backs away and smears a single down the ground

Faheem to Carey, OUT Pakistan's fielding veers from ordinary to extraordinary. This rocket drive from Carey seemed destined to fly to the boundary. Instead, Shadab throws himself to his right from mid-off and plucks it out with one hand, inches from the ground. Simply sensational. This was very full and outside off, belted away in the air.
Faheem to Agar, no run back of a length and angling across off, jabbed to short cover
Faheem to Agar, 2 runs wide yorker, jammed to sweeper cover. And here comes the fumble. Perfectly sumps up Pakistan
Hasan Ali to Short, 2 runs really full on middle stump, clipped away to deep midwicket
Hasan Ali to Short, 2 runs middle-stump yorker, squeezed away to the left of deep square leg for two
Hasan Ali to Short, 1 run slower offcutter outside off, toe-ended away to wide long-on
Hasan Ali to Stoinis, 1 run slower length ball outside off, punched away down to long-on

Hasan Ali to Short, SIX runs Short connects with this and middles a six over wide long-on. This was in his swinging arc - on a length and outside off - Short smites it away. Sarfraz shakes his head in disapproval
Hasan Ali to Short, SIX runs Short now jumps away outside leg, dragged shorter and outside off, Short stays leg-side of the ball and launches another six, this soars over Hasan's head
Amir to Stoinis, SIX runs back of a length on middle stump, Stoinis lines it up and muscles it over midwicket for a huuuuuuuge six. Three successive sixes for Australia
Amir to Stoinis, 1 wide slower cutter, floated wide outside off past the tramline. Sarfraz suggested a slower one but Amir's line is wrong
Amir to Stoinis, 2 runs low full-toss on off, Stoinis clears his front leg and smears it away down the ground. The man at long-on dives across to his left to intercept this muscular drive
Amir to Stoinis, no run lifter, angling away outside off, Stoinis does not get any bat on the ramp

Amir to Stoinis, OUT full-toss, angling away outside off, Stoinis is forced to reach out for the ball. He carves this low full-toss to sweeper cover, where Malik, after dropping Finch on 0 earlier in the morning, takes it with both hands
Amir to Head, no run Head gets behind the line of this short ball on off and fends it back to Amir
Amir to Head, 1 run full-toss, swinging in at off, clipped to long leg
Hasan Ali to Head, 1 run mighty full on leg stump, backs away and squeezes a single square through the off side
Hasan Ali to Agar, 1 run middle-stump yorker, dug out to long-on
Hasan Ali to Head, 1 run leg-stump yorker, jammed to deep third man now
Hasan Ali to Agar, FOUR runs Hasan hunts for the yorker again, but overpitches it on middle stump, Agar gets underneath the length and swings a four over mid-off
Hasan Ali to Agar, (no ball) beamer, slips out of the hand, flies over the ducking Agar to Sarfraz. No-ball, of course. It did not pitch at all, flies into the hands of the keeper
Hasan Ali to Agar, no run full and swinging away outside off, beats Agar's own swing
Hasan Ali to Agar, OUT bowled'em. That's a bail trimmer. Good length on off stump, Agar swings for the hills... and does not get bat on ball. Hasan clips the off bail to cap his spell with a wicket
Amir to Head, OUT Australia continue to lose their way in the end over. Head holes out to long-on. On a length and outside off, Head swings and gets more height as opposed to distance
Amir to Wildermuth, 1 run low full-toss slanting away outside off, scooped to mid-off for one
Amir to Tye, no run back of a length and zipping away outside off, Tye can't touch it
Amir to Tye, OUT Killer yorker from Amir. It floors the middle stump. Ripper from over the wicket, storms under Tye's swinging bat. Can Australia reach 180?
Amir to Jhye Richardson, 2 runs full and angling across off, backs away and caresses it to sweeper cover

Amir to Jhye Richardson, FOUR runs Yes, Australia go past 180. Fuller than a good length and slanting away wide outside off, Richardson, having skipped away outside leg, reached out for the ball and carves a four fine of deep third man

11.36pm Nevertheless, this has been a fine comeback from Pakistan. Australia were 95 for 0 in the tenth over, then lost 8 for 88. But runs on the board in a title bout counts for something. We will be back soon for the chase Cheers.
11.45amHello again. Zaman has a new opening partner in Farhan, who averages just over 52 in List A cricket. Maxi has the new ball. Interesting...
Maxwell to Zaman, 1 run flighted on off from round the wicket, driven down to long-off off the front foot

Maxwell to Sahibzada Farhan, 1 wide, OUT Duck for Farhan on T20I debut. What an unfortunate way to go, that too in your first international. Maxwell slides a full ball down the leg side, draws the batsman out of the crease, Farhan falls over, and the keeper whips the bails off. Stumped off a leg-side wide
Maxwell to Talat, no run lobbed up outside off, encourages the batsman to drive and goes past the outside edge
Maxwell to Talat, no run pushed through on off stump, forward and tipped to the covers

Maxwell to Talat, OUT Maxwell strikes twice in the first over with the new ball. Talat also gone for a duck. Maxwell tosses up this outside off and gets it to break away. Talat drives a long way away from the body and slices a catch to backward point. Dream start to the defence for Maxwell and Australia
Maxwell to Sarfaraz, 1 run full on pads from round the stumps, glanced to fine leg
Maxwell to Zaman, no run dropped short and outside off, Zaman reaches out for the ball and flashes to point
Stanlake to Sarfaraz, no run runs in hard, finds extra bounce to send the ball screaming past the outside edge right away
Stanlake to Sarfaraz, no run back of a length and snaking in on off, Sarfraz hops, skips, and fends it away to the leg side
Stanlake to Sarfaraz, 1 run wide of the crease, holds its line outside off, Sarfraz angles it down to deep third man
Stanlake to Zaman, no run lifter on leg stump, gets big on Zaman, and beats the hook
Stanlake to Zaman, 1 run back of a length on leg stump, Zaman gets behind the line and pushes a single to the covers
Stanlake to Sarfaraz, no run back of a length and bounces over middle stump as Sarfraz hoicks to the leg side and misses
Maxwell to Zaman, 2 runs tossed up at off, dips, skewed in the air over extra cover
Maxwell to Zaman, FOUR runs darted outside off, drilled down the ground past the left of Maxwell for a powerful four
Maxwell to Zaman, FOUR runs back of a length and breaks away outside off, Zaman skips away outside leg, creates additional room and carts it up and over extra cover
Maxwell to Zaman, 1 run Zaman runs down the track and hacks a short ball from middle down to long-on
Maxwell to Sarfaraz, SIX runs Sarfraz jumps away outside leg, this is tossed on his legs. Sarfraz goes low and slugs a slog-sweep over midwicket
Maxwell to Sarfaraz, FOUR runs Sarfraz jumps outside leg again, meets a short ball outside off and flays it square through the off side for another boundary
Stanlake to Zaman, FOUR runs Zaman steps away outside leg, this is on a length and outside off, the batsman stays leg-side of the ball and pumps it over the covers. Pakistan's chase is on
Stanlake to Zaman, 1 run Zaman backs away outside leg and stabs a shortish ball to point
Stanlake to Sarfaraz, no run Sarfraz aims for a cut, but Stanlake hits the splice with a short ball. It rolls away to point
Stanlake to Sarfaraz, no run back of a length and on a fifth-stump line, Sarfraz backs away and looks to go over the covers. No dice. Beaten on the outside edge
Stanlake to Sarfaraz, FOUR runs Sarfraz hangs deep in the crease, picks a short ball from outside off and pulls it away to the long-on fence
Stanlake to Sarfaraz, 1 run pitched up and outside off, punched up to Tye at mid-on for one
Jhye Richardson to Sarfaraz, no run back of a length on a fourth-stump line, opens the face and punches to cover
Jhye Richardson to Sarfaraz, no run back of a length, angling in, straightening away as Sarfraz wafts and misses in the channel
Jhye Richardson to Sarfaraz, no run Sarfraz makes room outside leg but is beaten by this zippy short ball chasing him
Jhye Richardson to Sarfaraz, no run back of a length and seaming away, another swish and a miss. Four dots on the bounce
Jhye Richardson to Sarfaraz, FOUR runs back of a length on a fourth-stump line, spanked away. Stays leg-side of the ball and sends it up and over extra cover with a flourish
Jhye Richardson to Sarfaraz, 1 run picked off the hips wide of short fine leg for one
Tye to Sarfaraz, FOUR runs slower ball, short and outside off, Sarfraz reads the change-up and drags it away to the wide long-on boundary. Shot, Safi

Tye to Sarfaraz, 2 runs, OUT on a length and outside off, Sarfraz knows fine leg is up, he scoops it away over short fine leg. Nice shot but harebrained running between the wickets. Richardson swoops down on the ball, slides, hauls it in, and the throw comes to the bowler, Sarfraz is caught napping on the third. He was so very late to take
Tye to Zaman, 1 run short on leg stump, flapped away to short fine leg
Tye to Malik, no run back of a length and outside off, punched back to the bowler
Tye to Malik, no run slower ball on off, chipped past the left of the bowler
Tye to Malik, no run short knuckle ball, Malik is early into his shot and wears it on the body
Jhye Richardson to Zaman, no run dipping full-toss on leg stump, dug out
Jhye Richardson to Zaman, no run banged short and outside off, chops a cut to the covers
Jhye Richardson to Zaman, 1 run Zaman leans back and chops a short ball from outside off to backward point
Jhye Richardson to Malik, no run back of a length and angling into a dab to point
Jhye Richardson to Malik, no run back of a length and angling in on off, opens the face and plays it behind to the keeper
Jhye Richardson to Malik, no run back of a length on off, tapped to point
Stoinis to Zaman, SIX runs Zaman jumps away outside leg, takes a length ball and plants it into the stands beyond wide long-on. Muscled away
Stoinis to Zaman, FOUR runs back of a length on the hips, Zaman flicks his wrists and sends the ball to the square-leg boundary
Stoinis to Zaman, no run slower ball, beaten outside off
Stoinis to Zaman, 2 runs slower offcutter, punched up to backward point
Stoinis to Zaman, 1 run slower, short ball on middle, swivel-pulled to short fine leg. Another offcutter from Stoinis
Stoinis to Malik, 1 run Malik gets off the mark after seven balls with a pull shot to long-on
Maxwell to Malik, 2 runs full on middle from round the wicket, bunted away to long-on
Maxwell to Malik, 2 runs short, angling away, leans back and punches in the gap at point
Maxwell to Malik, 1 run Malik comes down the track, Maxwell fires it short and wide outside off, chopped away to point
Maxwell to Zaman, 1 run off-stump yorker, jammed down to long-on
Maxwell to Malik, 1 run tossed on middle, eased away between wide long-on and deep midwicket
Maxwell to Zaman, FOUR runs back of a length on middle, this hip-high ball is merrily swatted away over backward square leg for a one-bounce four. Bam!
Stanlake to Malik, no run Malik moves outside leg, back of a length and wide outside off, past the reach of Malik
Stanlake to Malik, 1 run full on middle stump, push-driven down to long-on
Stanlake to Zaman, no run Zaman backs away outside leg, the bowler follows him with a bouncer, the opener carefully ducks under it
Stanlake to Zaman, 1 run picked off the pads to fine leg
Stanlake to Malik, 1 run back of a length and outside off, smoothly punched to sweeper cover
Stanlake to Zaman, 2 runs full on middle, backs away and smears it to extra cover, where Wildermuth fumbles
Wildermuth to Malik, FOUR runs tucked off the hips to the right of deep square leg for four. Poor line from Wildermuth to follow the fumble at cover
Wildermuth to Malik, 1 run full and angling in on middle, tipped away to square leg
Wildermuth to Zaman, no run slower short ball outside off, Zaman cuts and misses in the corridor, throwing his hands at the ball
Wildermuth to Zaman, 1 wide short and wide outside off, looks like another slower ball, but it's well past the tramline
Wildermuth to Zaman, FOUR runs short, wide, reaches out for the ball with his hands and carves it away behind point. The ball thuds into the boundary. Zaman loves it there
Wildermuth to Zaman, 1 wide darted short and too wide outside off, another off-side wide from Wildermuth
Wildermuth to Zaman, 1 wide very full and very wide outside off, Zaman flits around in the crease, throwing the bowler off
Wildermuth to Zaman, 1 wide back of a length and angling away outside past the tramline. Yet another off-side wide
Wildermuth to Zaman, 2 runs back of a length and angling away close to off, punched up to backward point. The fielder has a shy at the non-striker's end and concedes an overthrow
Wildermuth to Zaman, 1 run Zaman throws his hands a wide one and smears it to sweeper cover to round out the 10-ball over
Agar to Zaman, 1 run full just outside off. Spinning into Fakhar, and he swipes at it across the line. Thumped to long on
Agar to Malik, 1 run full on leg stump, and Malik opens his stance to drive to cover

Agar to Zaman, SIX runs straight as an arrow! Full outside off, and he comes dancing down the wicket before drilling it over Agar's head! Enough width for him to smack this flat-batted for a maximum. Fifty too

Agar to Zaman, FOUR runs full outside off, and once again Fakhar comes down the wicket. Mistimes a thump over the non-striker's head, but still has enough legs to crash into the boundary. Ten off two balls
Agar to Zaman, FOUR runs drilled! Full on leg stump, but Fakhar expected that. Backs away to the leg side, and then slaps this past Malik for a boundary. Almost took the non-striker out
Agar to Zaman, 1 bye full and fast outside off stump. Fakhar lets it go, and the ball hits the keeper's pads. The ball trickles away to point for extras
Tye to Zaman, FOUR runs full outside off, but it's the slower ball from Tye. Waits for the ball to get to him, before slapping a late cut past the keeper's left
Tye to Zaman, FOUR runs cheeky! Slower ball outside off again, and Fakhar shuffles across to the leg side, and scoops a pull over square leg for more runs
Tye to Zaman, 1 run yorker outside off, and Fakhar digs this down the ground to long off for a quick single
Tye to Malik, FOUR runs up and over! Short on off, and Malik tries to pull. Through his shot too early, and it's been top-edged over Carey. Leaking runs now
Tye to Malik, 1 run slower ball, but on a length outside off. Malik opens his bat's face and pushes to point with soft hands
Tye to Zaman, 1 run low full toss on off, and that's been driven to long off for one. Malik wanted two, but Fakhar says no
Stanlake to Zaman, 1 leg bye Fakhar moves away outside leg, Stanlake chases him with a full ball that grazes the pad and squirts away to fine leg
Stanlake to Malik, 1 run short and just a shade outside off, Malik gets up on his tippy toes and rides it down to deep third man's right
Stanlake to Zaman, SIX runs short and wide outside off, Zaman jumps outside leg and flays it up and over backward point. Thumped into the deserted stands
Stanlake to Zaman, 1 run Jumps away outside leg and stabs it to the leg side
Stanlake to Malik, no run short and skips back in, fended to the covers off the back foot
Stanlake to Malik, no run Malik backs away, leg-stump yorker, dug back
Stoinis to Zaman, 1 run Zaman gets on top of a short ball outside off and firmly cuts it away to sweeper cover
Stoinis to Malik, 1 run offcutter outside off, whipped away to deep midwicket
Stoinis to Zaman, 1 run full-toss outside off, driven sweetly to sweeper cover
Stoinis to Malik, 1 run slower bouncer on middle, swatted away to long leg
Stoinis to Zaman, FOUR runs short and wide outside off, Zaman stays leg-side of the ball again, and pummels it away to the cover fence. Flat-bats this offcutter into oblivion
Stoinis to Zaman, FOUR runs slower, short ball outside off, crunched away. Agar overruns the ball and gives up four. Nothing going Australia's way
Jhye Richardson to Malik, 2 runs full on the stumps, laced down to long-on
Jhye Richardson to Malik, 1 wide leg-side wide
Jhye Richardson to Malik, no run back of a length on off, Malik sits back in the crease and chops the ball away to point
Jhye Richardson to Malik, 1 run leans back and chops this short ball much finer to third man
Jhye Richardson to Zaman, 1 run slower cutter on middle, run away to point
Jhye Richardson to Malik, 1 run back of a length on middle, flipped away to deep square leg for one

Jhye Richardson to Zaman, OUT Zaman holes out to deep backward point. No hundred for him. Zaman shows his cards early and steps away outside leg. The bowler goes shorter and wider outside off. Zaman still reaches out for the ball and slices underneath the ball in the air but straight down the throat of Maddinson, the sub
Tye to Asif Ali, no run back of a length and nips away outside off past the outside edge
Tye to Asif Ali, no run fullish on off, dropped to the covers
Tye to Asif Ali, no run back of a length and outside off, Ali slogs and misses
Tye to Asif Ali, 1 run full on middle and leg, tapped down to long-off for one now
Tye to Malik, 1 run turned to the leg side for one
Tye to Asif Ali, no run Asif aims to mow a length ball over midwicket but is beaten by extra bounce in the corridor
Jhye Richardson to Malik, SIX runs length ball on off stump, Malik lines it up and smokes it over the midwicket boundary. Such a smooth swing
Jhye Richardson to Malik, 1 run near yorker on middle, squeezed away to long-on
Jhye Richardson to Asif Ali, 1 run slower ball outside off, driven hard to long-off
Jhye Richardson to Malik, 1 run banged in short on middle, shovel-pulls to deep square leg
Jhye Richardson to Asif Ali, 2 runs slower ball outside off, pulled away straight of long-on. Finch slides to his left and parries the ball to long-off

Jhye Richardson to Asif Ali, SIX runs nice and full on off - right in the slot - Asif Ali gets underneath the length and slams it straight over the bowler's head like a boss. The slower ball has been dispatched into the stands
Tye to Malik, FOUR runs full on middle stump, Malik backs away outside leg and smears it over point for four
Tye to Malik, 1 run shuffles outside leg and nurdles a single past short fine leg
Tye to Asif Ali, 1 run Ali bunts a full ball on middle to long-on
Tye to Malik, no run Malik backs away outside leg and digs out a yorker to the keeper
Tye to Malik, 1 run slog-swept away to deep fine leg
Tye to Asif Ali, 2 runs middle-stump yorker, jammed down to long-on for a couple of runs. Pakistan another couple away from victory
Stoinis to Malik, 1 run back of a length and outside off, muscled away to long-on

Stoinis to Asif Ali, FOUR runs Pakistan clinch the tri-series in Zimbabwe! Back of a length and outside off, slower offcutter from Stoinis, Asif Ali reads it and slugs it away wide of deep midwicket for four
Sarfraz collects the trophy and is joined by his team-mates. There's the No. 1 T20I team. That's a wrap of this tri-series. Goodbye

1.21pm There it is. Pakistan seal their highest successful chase to win the tri-series title. Notably, this is their ninth successive T20I series win. Sarfraz runs onto the field and embraces Asif Ali and the uber-cool Shoaib Malik. Australia's openers Finch and Short ran away to 95 for 0 but some excellent end-overs bowling sparked a collapse as
Pakistan won by 6 wickets (with 4 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Fakhar Zaman, PAK
